sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO consume_item (creator, gmt_created, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, item_name, address, price, quantity, total_price, fee_date, in_out, login_id) VALUES (#creator#, now(), #modifier#, now(), 'no', #itemName#, #address#, #price#, #quantity#, #totalPrice#, #feeDate#, #inOrOut#, #loginId#)
sqlMap.select: select consume_item_id as consumeItemId, creator as creator, gmt_created as gmtCreated, modifier as modifier, gmt_modified as gmtModified, is_deleted as isDeleted, item_name as itemName, address as address, price as price, quantity as quantity, total_price as totalPrice, fee_date as feeDate, login_id as loginId, in_out as inOrOut from consume_item where login_id = #loginId# and is_deleted='no' and fee_date >= #startDate# AND fee_date <= #endDate# order by fee_date asc
select sum(total_price) from consume_item where login_id = #loginId# and is_deleted='no' and fee_date >= #startDate# AND fee_date <= #endDate#

select consume_item_id as consumeItemId, creator as creator, gmt_created as gmtCreated, modifier as modifier, gmt_modified as gmtModified, is_deleted as isDeleted, item_name as itemName, address as address, price as price, quantity as quantity, total_price as totalPrice, fee_date as feeDate, login_id as loginId, in_out as inOrOut from consume_item where consume_item_id = #consumeItemId# and is_deleted='no'
sqlMap.update: update consume_item set modifier = #modifier#, gmt_modified = now(), item_name = #itemName#, address = #address#, price = #price#, quantity = #quantity#, total_price = #totalPrice#, fee_date = #feeDate#, in_out = #inOrOut# where consume_item_id = #consumeItemId# and is_deleted = 'no'
update consume_item set is_deleted = 'yes', modifier = #modifier#, gmt_modified = now() where consume_item_id = #consumeItemId#
